subject: Happy new year!!!!!!!!!!
message: Just wanted to welcome you into 2016!

subject: Retirement party!
message:
Hello,

After 20 years in the NBA, I've decided to hang up my shoes and call it a career. I've enjoyed watching you watch me play and I would like to formally invite you to my retirement party next week. Hope you can make it!

Mamba out

subject: New owner of this account
message: In January 2017, my time in office will be over and there will be a new owner of this account

subject: One free ticket to React Rally!
message:
Hey you!

Have you ever been to Utah before? No? Well, here's your opportunity! React Rally is taken place once again in the great state of Utah and you've won one free ticket to attend! Come learn about the whole React ecosystem and the new libraries popping up!

Have a great day,
React Rally Team

subject: Account alert: Data usage overage
message: This email is to inform you that account #XXXXX3824 has passed its 10GB for this billing cycle. Each additional MB that you spend will be $1. We suggest you stop stream cat videos from YouTube.

subject: Pay rent
message: Just wanted to remind you to pay your rent today!
